animeTitle: Breaking Through The Heavens and the Worlds With One Punch
otherNames: Yi Li Po Zhu Tian Wan Jie, Breaking Through All the Worlds With One Force, Yī Lì Pò Zhū Tiān Wàn Jiè, 一力破诸天万界, One Punch Breaks the Heavens and the Worlds
synopsis: Once, the genius Ning Yu of Hanshan City was framed and set up, resulting in the destruction of his dantian (energy center) and the loss of all his cultivation. After failing to get help from his father’s friends in the sect, he accidentally stumbled into a divine and demonic breeding ground. From then on, with a single punch, he swept through the universe, turning heaven and earth into his chessboard.
